resources.string:
Wifi Messenger is a messaging application for Android devices that uses the IP Messenger protocol.

Note: This project is in no way affiliated with the official IP Messenger project.

Project of this app on Github:
https://github.com/okiislandsh/WifiMessenger

PlayStore Developer Account (Account scheduled for BAN):
https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=6502094932138875905

PlayStore Wifi Messenger (Account scheduled for BAN):
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.okiislandsh.util.wifitoys

Amazon appstore Wifi Messenger (Amazon is ending Android support for its Appstore in 2025 on August 20th.):
http://www.amazon.com/gp/mas/dl/android?p=jp.okiislandsh.util.wifitoys.amzn

Release Notes:
https://sites.google.com/view/shima-app-release-note

Privacy Policy:
https://sites.google.com/view/wifi-messenger

App License:
https://sites.google.com/view/wifi-messenger/license

IP Messenger protocol Memo:
https://okiislandsh.blogspot.com/


IP Messenger Official Website:
https://ipmsg.org/

DISCLAIMER

IF YOU USE THIS APP,
YOU AGREE TO THE FOLLOWING DISCLAIMER.
IF YOU DO NOT AGREE, UNINSTALL IT IMMEDIATELY.

●FOR THE USE OF THIS APP,
IN THE EVENT OF TROUBLE, LOSS, DAMAGE, ETC.,
DEVELOPERS ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE.

●THE INSTALLED VERSION DOES NOT SUPPORT IP-MESSENGER PROTOCOL ENCRYPTED COMMUNICATION, SO USE ONLY WITH RELIABLE WIFI.

●ABOUT THE INTERCEPTION AND LEAKAGE OF THE INFORMATION TO BE TRANSMITTED AND RECEIVED, DEVELOPERS ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE.
